About

Gaston Christian’s Mission isn’t just six words, it’s our identity

PREPARE PEOPLE

First, we see that our mission goes beyond the students of our school, but should also involve the parents and the local community. Wherever we can, we want to prepare people to be strong disciples of Christ.

TEACH TRUTH

With so much pressure to conform to the world, we want everyone associated with GCS to truly understand our commitment to teach truth, starting with understanding that God made man in His image.

GLORIFY GOD

We want to see the name of Jesus lifted up on our campus. We want to glorify God in our classroom, on the athletic field, and in the community. We are his ambassadors and in all things we want to glorify God.

TRAINING THE MIND

We Educate

Gaston Christian School students at all grade levels are encouraged to think creatively and critically through the prism of a Christian worldview making GCS a truly unique private school in Gastonia.

SET FOR SUCCESS

Developing college ready graduates

Gaston Christian School is a premiere Christian school in Gaston County with a mission to academically and spiritually prepare students in light of God’s word. GCS graduates have been accepted to over 200 four-year colleges and universities – small and large, public and private, Christian and secular, Ivy League and art & design institutes, including:

The 55 members of the Class of 2024 were offered scholarships and grants with a total value of more than $3.38 Million.

I have two children at Gaston Christian and have been involved with the school for 8 years. My family could not be more pleased. GCS provides an affordable but challenging college preparatory education with a strong Biblical foundation.

Kevin Joyce, Parent
